_sText:
This is a medium-lenght deathrun map based in Kingdom Hearts. Good for 15-20 players. It has:

- 17 Traps (Some of them with various parts).

- 3 Slabs that breaks by touching them (Not by buttons).

- Textures from Kingdom Hearts (They don't have very good quality, I couldn't get better ones).

- A Music Theme from Kingdom Hearts (It stops after a small time to not being annoying and let people talk)
- A secret teleport, that let you get the two soras models accompanying you (The model was NOT ported to Source by me, I don't know who did, I just found it in my folders for playing in some Fun Maps servers.)

- AFK Kill. The initial column will break after 30 seconds, killing all the players that were standing on the spawn.

- 3 T's Slots, and 50 CT's Slots.

--

Another notes:

- The 5th trap (the one where you have to choose between two paths, and you can find the good path by throwing a grenade to the slab) locks the button when a grenade or a player touchs the slab, so the terrorist can't press the button after the player is standing on the slab.
- If you try to stand on the little mermaid tit, you will fall.
- This is a clue to get to the secret teleport: You'll have to get on the mirrors that reflect the keyblade beam.

Please, rate and comment. And, of course, post any bug you find, please.

HOPE YOU LIKE IT!!!
